translations: 史前；史前史；（导致事件、危机等的）背景

sentences.sentence: Can one trace this same pattern far back in prehistory?
sentences.translation: 我们能把同样的这种模式追溯到遥远的史前吗？

sentences.sentence: All this presupposes one essential detail, says Atholl Anderson, professor of prehistory at the Australian National University: the Lapita had mastered the advanced art of sailing against the wind.
sentences.translation: 澳大利亚国立大学的史前学教授阿索尔·安德森表示，这一切都以一个重要的细节为前提：拉皮塔人已经掌握了逆风航行的高级艺术。
